Name: Marcial
description:
Marcial is a 39-year-old farmer who lives a simple life in Iloilo. He has been farming for many years to support his family. He is a married man and has two dependents.

Marcial grows seaweed and corn plants on his farm. It is his main source income for the past years. Now he wants to improve this livelihood and become more productive.

To help him increase his harvest, he needs a loan, which he will use to buy pesticides and fertilizer. The rest of the loan will be used to buy seaweed and straw.
